name: Simulator Upgrade Project
description: Developed a C# overlay and Arduino-based hardware system that enhanced in-game immersion through real-time telemetry integration. The system featured an in-game overlay displaying live vehicle data, an ABS sensor, a PWM-controlled fan that adjusted speed based on vehicle velocity, and a distance sensor used to dynamically calibrate the optimal field of view (FOV) based on the player's position.
